example.text: financier Tito Tettamanti , whose secretive raid on the company 's stock had led to a bitter battle

example.name: autogen2
example.text: In 1976 , as an upstart in the eyes of Switzerland 's establishment , Mr. Rey laid the foundations of his present-day prominence with an unheard-of raid on Bally , the country 's traditional shoemaker .
example.arg: on Bally , the country 's traditional shoemaker
